text: Dark Steed
Cold One
Dark Pegasus
No longer true horses, these once-pristine elven steeds have been corrupted by dark magic into pitch-black killers.
Native to Naggaroth, these dark and ferocious beasts emerge from their dank nests to carry the Druchii into battle.
Corrupted pegasi have flown south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains, where they now nest.

Dark Pegasus
Manticore
Black Dragon
No longer true horses, these once-pristine elven steeds have been corrupted by dark magic into pitch-black killers.
Native to Naggaroth, these dark and ferocious beasts emerge from their dank nests to carry the Druchii into battle.
Corrupted pegasi have flown south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains, where they now nest.
The roar of a manticore is enough to send mortal creatures fleeing, for they know a fearsome predator is near.
Black Dragons are the secret creations of Malekith, their bodies infused with dark magic for corruption and power.

Sorceress (Lore of Life)
In Ghrond, the swirling eddies of the Eight Winds of Magic provide profound insight. Those attuned to the Wind of Ghyran are rare and invaluable.
Sorceress (Lore of Light)
While most sorceresses wield the power of dark magic, a few channel the White Wind of Hysh, often to combat and banish northern daemons.
Sorceress (Lore of Heavens)
While astrology is a common practice among the despised Asur, mastery over the Wind of Azyr confounds the "masters" of the White Tower.
Sorceress (Lore of Metal)
These sorceresses excel at extracting Chamon's essence from turbulent winds, crafting it into deadly weaponry.

Manticore
If successfully tamed, it becomes a beast of unbridled fury and a perfect mount for a dark lord.

Black Dragon

In Ghrond, a swirling vortex of the eight winds of magic provides unparalleled insight. Some Sorceresses have a deep affinity with Ghyran, making them exceedingly rare.
While most Sorceresses wield dark magic, a select few choose Hysh to repel and banish the northern daemons.
While stargazing is a common Asur practice, mastering Azyr to perplex the White Tower's masters grants Druchii the upper hand.
These Sorceresses excel at extracting Chamon's energy from the chaotic winds to craft deadly weapons.
